languages.text: {n}Откинувшись на простыни, Соломон довольно потягивается, расправляя широкие плечи. Темную кожу покрывают капли пота.{/n} "Это было ровно то, что мне было нужно. Но куда больше, чем то, на что я смел рассчитывать". {n}Арбитр дарит вам скупую улыбку — кажется, демонстрировать свои чувства ярче он просто не умеет.{/n}

{n}Lying back on the sheets, Solomorne stretches out contentedly, rolling his broad shoulders. Drops of sweat cover his dark skin.{/n} "That was exactly what I needed. But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

Но куда больше, чем то, на что я смел рассчитывать". {n}Арбитр дарит вам скупую улыбку — кажется, демонстрировать свои чувства ярче он просто не умеет.{/n}

But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne räkelt sich zufrieden auf den Laken und rollt mit seinen breiten Schultern. Schweißperlen bedecken seine dunkle Haut.{/n} "Genau das habe ich gebraucht. Aber es war weit mehr, als ich zu hoffen gewagt hatte." {n}Er schenkt dir ein schmales Lächeln, als wüsste er nicht, wie er seinen Gefühlen sonst Ausdruck verleihen sollte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying back on the sheets, Solomorne stretches out contentedly, rolling his broad shoulders. Drops of sweat cover his dark skin.{/n} "That was exactly what I needed. But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne räkelt sich zufrieden auf den Laken und rollt mit seinen breiten Schultern. Schweißperlen bedecken seine dunkle Haut.{/n} "Genau das habe ich gebraucht. Aber es war weit mehr, als ich zu hoffen gewagt hatte." {n}Er schenkt dir ein schmales Lächeln, als wüsste er nicht, wie er seinen Gefühlen sonst Ausdruck verleihen sollte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Allongé sur les draps, Solomorne s'étire avec satisfaction en faisant rouler ses larges épaules. Des gouttes de sueur parsèment sa peau noire.{/n} « C'était exactement ce dont j'avais besoin, même si je n'aurais jamais osé en espérer autant. » {n}Il vous adresse un petit sourire, comme s'il ne savait pas comment exprimer ses sentiments plus ouvertement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying back on the sheets, Solomorne stretches out contentedly, rolling his broad shoulders. Drops of sweat cover his dark skin.{/n} "That was exactly what I needed. But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

Des gouttes de sueur parsèment sa peau noire.{/n} « C'était exactement ce dont j'avais besoin, même si je n'aurais jamais osé en espérer autant. » {n}Il vous adresse un petit sourire, comme s'il ne savait pas comment exprimer ses sentiments plus ouvertement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}シーツの上に横たわったソロモーンは満足そうに体を伸ばし、広い肩を回すようにしてほぐした。汗がその褐色の肌に滴っている。{/n}「まさに今の私に必要なことでした。ですが、望んでもよいレベルをはるかに超えていました」{n}彼はかすかに微笑んだ。それ以上はどう気持ちを表せばいいのかわからないといった様子で。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying back on the sheets, Solomorne stretches out contentedly, rolling his broad shoulders. Drops of sweat cover his dark skin.{/n} "That was exactly what I needed. But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}シーツの上に横たわったソロモーンは満足そうに体を伸ばし、広い肩を回すようにしてほぐした。汗がその褐色の肌に滴っている。{/n}「まさに今の私に必要なことでした。ですが、望んでもよいレベルをはるかに超えていました」{n}彼はかすかに微笑んだ。それ以上はどう気持ちを表せばいいのかわからないといった様子で。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tumbado sobre las sábanas, Solomorne se estira, girando los hombros. Su piel oscura está cubierta de sudor.{/n} «Esto ha sido justo lo que necesitaba, y mucho más de lo que me atrevía a esperar». {n}Te dedica una sonrisa estrecha, como si no supiera expresar mejor sus emociones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying back on the sheets, Solomorne stretches out contentedly, rolling his broad shoulders. Drops of sweat cover his dark skin.{/n} "That was exactly what I needed. But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

Su piel oscura está cubierta de sudor.{/n} «Esto ha sido justo lo que necesitaba, y mucho más de lo que me atrevía a esperar». {n}Te dedica una sonrisa estrecha, como si no supiera expresar mejor sus emociones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙躺在被单上，心满意足地伸着懒腰。他甩了甩宽阔的肩膀，汗珠覆满了他黝黑的皮肤。{/n}“这正是我渴望的一切，而又远远超出了我胆敢期望的程度。”{n}他对你露出了淡淡的笑容，仿佛突然忘记该如何坦率表达自己的感情一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying back on the sheets, Solomorne stretches out contentedly, rolling his broad shoulders. Drops of sweat cover his dark skin.{/n} "That was exactly what I needed. But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne; yatağa uzanıp keyifle geriniyor, geniş omuzlarını gevşetiyor. Esmer teni, terden sırılsıklam olmuş vaziyette.{/n} "O kadar iyi geldi ki... Hatta hayal ettiğimden çok daha iyiydi." {n}Hislerini daha açıkça ifade etmeyi beceremiyormuşçasına sana hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying back on the sheets, Solomorne stretches out contentedly, rolling his broad shoulders. Drops of sweat cover his dark skin.{/n} "That was exactly what I needed. But far more than I dared hope." {n}He gives you a thin smile, as though he does not know how to express his feelings any more overtly.{/n}

Hatta hayal ettiğimden çok daha iyiydi." {n}Hislerini daha açıkça ifade etmeyi beceremiyormuşçasına sana hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n}
